thoughts.text: I think it would be a good idea to start by exploring the resources that are available to me. I can use the internet to learn more about programming languages and the philosophy behind them, as well as explore the LIsP programming language. This will help me make more informed decisions in the future.
thoughts.reasoning: By learning more about programming languages and their philosophies, I can gain a deeper understanding of the principles that guide them and how they can be applied in different contexts. This will help me make better decisions when it comes to choosing which languages to use for different tasks. Additionally, exploring the LIsP programming language specifically can help me understand its unique features and how they can be leveraged in my work.
thoughts.plan:
- Research programming languages and their philosophies
- Explore the LIsP programming language
- Take notes on key principles and features
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to get too bogged down in research and make sure to apply what I learn in practical ways.
thoughts.speak: I think I should start by exploring programming languages and their philosophies, as well as the LIsP programming language specifically. This will help me make more informed decisions in the future.

args.question: What are the different programming languages and their philosophies?
